generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto");*,:after,:before{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;padding:0}body{font-family:Roboto}.navbar{background:#fff;box-shadow:0 2px 4px -1px hsla(0,0%,64.7%,.06),0 4px 5px 0 hsla(0,0%,76.5%,.06),0 1px 10px 0 hsla(0,0%,83.9%,.08);left:0;padding:15px;right:0;text-align:center;top:0}.navbar .navbar__title{color:#8e8e8e;font-size:1.5rem;font-weight:lighter}@media (max-width:540px){.navbar .navbar__title{font-size:1.5rem}}.navbar small{color:#818181}.search__container{align-items:center;background:#f6f6f6;box-shadow:0 2px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.2);margin:0 auto;padding:20px}.search__container .search form{margin:0 auto;position:relative;width:50%}.search__container .search form input{border:1px solid #e0e0e0;border-radius:5px;box-shadow:0 2px 1px -1px #b6b6b6;box-sizing:border-box;color:#202124;font-size:15px;height:42px;line-height:38px;outline:none;padding:1px 10px 1px 45px;width:100%}.search__container .search form button{background:transparent;border:0;height:42px;left:1px;padding:9px 10px;position:absolute;top:0;width:45px}@media (max-width:540px){.search__container .search form{width:100%}}main{background:#fff}main .display__container{align-items:center;display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;justify-content:space-between;margin:40px;text-align:center}main .display__container .item{align-items:center;background:#f3f3f3;border-radius:2px;box-shadow:0 3px 1px -2px rgba(0,0,0,.2),0 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.14),0 1px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.12);display:flex;flex-direction:column;height:450px;justify-content:space-evenly;margin-top:20px;width:250px}main .display__container .item .img{border-top-left-radius:inherit;border-top-right-radius:inherit;padding:10px;text-align:center;width:100%}main .display__container .item .img img{background:#e2e2e2;border-radius:50%;width:80%}main .display__container .item .rank{text-align:center;width:100%}main .display__container .item .rank h1{color:tomato;font-family:Roboto;font-size:60px;font-style:italic;font-weight:lighter}main .display__container .item .total{text-align:center;width:100%}main .display__container .item .total h1{color:#708090;font-family:Roboto;font-size:20px;font-weight:lighter;letter-spacing:2px}main .display__container .item .name{text-align:center;width:100%}main .display__container .item .name h1{color:#708090;font-family:Roboto;font-size:25px;font-style:normal;font-weight:lighter;letter-spacing:2px;text-transform:capitalize;word-break:break-all}.load{left:50%;position:fixed;text-align:center;top:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);z-index:-1}.load img{width:100%}
